go_data.justification: Kar2p presented an ATPase-specific activity of approximately 4 nmol of phosphate release per hour per muM of Kar2p in complex with both the nucleotide exchanger Lhs1p and the DnaJ-like partner.
Kar2p is an Hsp70 chaperone from the ER.
Kar2p is an Hsp70 chaperone, which is involved in protein folding.
